[[inst_v_shfl_down]]
==== V.SHFL.DOWN

*Syntax:* v.shfl.down SrcL.<T>, SrcR.<T>, SrcP.<T>, ->Dst.<W>

*Description:* Shuffle (down): permutes vector elements using register indices.
